alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 11:34AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Showers and Thunderstorms Capable of Producing Heavy Downpours and Strong Winds This Weekend... Moisture from post tropical storm Kay will push into central Nevada this weekend and lead to showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon and evening hours. Some of the storms could produce heavy downpours, which may result in localized flash flooding. In addition, strong downdraft/outflow winds are also possible. In addition, more showers and thunderstorms expected early to mid next week, which will have the threat for strong winds, heavy downpours and localized flash flooding. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
